description: Try our easy to follow Hot Cross Bun Fried Ice-Cream recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Hot Cross Bun Fried Ice-Cream Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk together egg, flour and 1 cup cold water. Heat oil in a large saucepan to 200°C. Remove 1 hot cross bun from the freezer, unwrap, dip in batter and carefully fry for 1 minute. Drain on paper towel and return to freezer. Repeat procedure with remaining hot cross buns and freeze for at least 30 minutes. Remove fried buns from freezer and dust with icing sugar. Serve immediately.

Drain on paper towel and return to freezer. Repeat procedure with remaining hot cross buns and freeze for at least 30 minutes. Remove fried buns from freezer and dust with icing sugar. Serve immediately.
